ModMetaData.name: Star Wars - Support Droids (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: FantasyFan
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of FantasyFans mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2210262524
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/StarWarsSupportDroids][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] Have you ever wanted to have other Droids from Star Wars in your base. Now you can.
This mod adds Star Wars Support Droids: -2-1B-Series (medical) -FX-7-Series (medical) -GNK-Series -MSE-6-Series (repair) -Viper-Probe-Droid
Adds bacta: -Bacta (raw resource) -Bacta Patch (medicine) -Bactade (medical food)
Other Star Wars Mods: -Tatooine Races: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1950621752 -Tatooine Factions: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1951919141
-Astromech Droids: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1961087173 -Protocol Droids: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1963551607
If you find things unbalanced, please make suggestions for improvement.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
